caption.p: Protective activity of Ery-Est against vertical transmission of ZIKV in pregnant C57BL/6 mice. C57BL/6 pregnant mice were infected by 2 × 10 5 PFU ZIKV, followed by treatments of Ery-Est (50 mg/kg), Ery (50 mg/kg) and vehicle respectively. Viral RNA loads ( A) in sera of pregnant mice, ( B) in placentas, and ( C) in fetal heads at 1 day post infection were measured by RT-qPCR. Three embryos of each pregnant mouse were randomly collected for placentas and fetal heads. Statistical analysis: Mann–Whitney test for ( A– C). Data are presented as means ± SD. ns = not significant. * p < 0.05; *** p < 0.001.
